project1.card-info: This tool has been developed merley to help non-pentesters to find common vulnerabilities within their applications. This contract provide full network & port enumeration with sql-scanning & mapping out CVEs

project2.card-info: NcNet is a security tool used for opening a shell on a remote victims device with zero malicious intent. Only for Educational purposes.

project3.card-info: This was develop for functionality purposes. I think the most important part about developement is functionaltity. On the constrast of developing this zoom Clone it provides user/room sessions.
